description: Hoss is a fictional character appearing in Marvel Comics, created by writer Garth Ennis and artist Clayton Crain. He is a demon, an enemy and occasional ally of the Ghost Rider. Hoss has been described as "one of Hell's most able tracker-scouts". He first appeared in Ghost Rider (Road to Damnation) #1 (Nov. 2005)
name: Hoss
powers: durability. Able to repair his own body
to rebuild humans into new forms. Able to track other demons. Able to extrude tentacles. Other magical powers
